itemwallet.tooltip.simpleMode:
If enabled, it will show the counters separately with no boxes.

By default, it is built into the interface. However, if something runs into each other or looks ugly,
you can adjust the position of the counters with the Editor Mode.
itemwallet.tooltip.enableExtraSupport:
Lets you convert similar currency into the primary one.

Currently supports:
- Diamonds <- Diamond Blocks
- Stone Ore <-> Deepslate Ore
- Netherite <- Netherite Blocks
- Emerald <- Emerald Blocks
- etc.
itemwallet.tooltip.editorMode:
Toggles the capability to move counters.

To do this, you need to hit the counter icon with LMB and move the counter with the arrows to the right place, then press Enter to save or Esc to reset.
